router
Class DatagramService.Datagram

java.lang.Object
  router.DatagramService.Datagram
Enclosing class:
DatagramService
public static class DatagramService.Datagram
extends java.lang.Object

The Datagram class represents an array of bytes and the interface it was received on or is to be transmitted on.

          Construct a Datagram.

Constructor Detail

DatagramService.Datagram

public DatagramService.Datagram(int iface,
                                byte[] data)
Construct a Datagram. (Note: setting data to null is used to indicated the particular interface is down)

Parameters:
iface - Interface the data was received on or is to be transmitted on
